software.description: DicomBrowser is a platform-independent desktop tool for inspecting DICOM header fields, editing DICOM header fields, viewing DICOM images, and transferring DICOM files to a DICOM receiver. DicomBrowser includes scriptable header editing to support various de-identification protocols. Dicomrowser is written in Java and uses ImageJ for image viewing and the dcm4che toolkit for much of its DICOM implementation. For more information: http://nrg.wustl.edu/software/dicom-brow...
